title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button and label no longer stay on the same line. Instead, the close button moves down below the label.
EB: The close button and label should remain on the same line, regardless of the size of the view. The close button should be located in the far right corner, as users are accustomed to.
SR:
1. Open the view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe the position of the close button and label.
